Package ausroulette.model.wheel

Interface Wheel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WheelImpl
    public interface Wheel
    Represents a color bet in the Aussie Roulette game in the Further Programming Assignment.

    You must not alter this interface.

    This interface should be implemented as WheelImpl.

    Maintains a collection of Pocket and using the methods described in this interface provides functionality of turning wheel from one pocket to the next, returning to the first pocket (number 0, Green) after the last pocket is reached

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    WheelImpl, Pocket, PocketColor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int LARGEST_NUMBER
      A constant the defines the maximum pocket number in the wheel's pockets
      static int NUMBER_OF_POCKETS
      A constant that defines the number of pockets in the wheel
      static int[] POCKET_NUMBERS
      An ordered array populated with the pocket numbers of the wheel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int generateRandomNumber()
      Generates a random pocket number.
      Pocket moveToNumber​(int number)
      Moves wheel the supplied pocket number and returns the pocket object
      Pocket nextPocket()
      Advances the wheel to the next pocket and returns the pocket at that position.

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomNumber

        int generateRandomNumber()
        Generates a random pocket number. Returned number is between 0 and LARGEST_NUMBER inclusive.
        Returns:
        a valid random pocket number

      • moveToNumber

        Pocket moveToNumber​(int number)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Moves wheel the supplied pocket number and returns the pocket object
        Parameters:
        number - the pocket number to move to
        Returns:
        the Pocket with the specified pocket number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied position is not a valid pocket number
        See Also:
        Pocket

      • nextPocket

        Pocket nextPocket()
        Advances the wheel to the next pocket and returns the pocket at that position.
        Returns:
        the Pocket at the updated wheel position
        See Also:
        Pocket
